TopicTitle: This Week in the Amazing Adventures Of Bob, Bill and Jeb..... (Warning, picture heavy

Articles.Content:
When we last left our intrepid Heroes, Bob and Jeb had "Landed" on the moon with no way back and if that wasn't bad enough Bill's replacement Sigwin realized his command ship didn't have any parachutes! Oh no!

The Egg heads back a HQ Call Poor Sigwin (Who is woefully hopeless as he not one of the heroes) and tell him to Dock with "The Asgard" The Small Space station that is still mostly unbuilt.

Now the Egg Heads quickly build and send a Rescue Ship, they call her "Rescue Ship Mrk. 231" (There have been quite a few accidents)

Now just a short and uneventful space Walk for our Young Red shirt and all will be good!

Erm, well atleast nothing Went boom. Now Our $23,298,233 poorer Sigwin must hope that the Egg Heads back home were really on their game, and that the thing doesn't fall apart upon entry.

The Egg Heads Did it! And that's all we have time for in this week's episode of the Amazing Adventures Of Bob, Bill and Jeb. Will Jeb and Bob Be rescued? Will Sigwin get approved for a Loan to cover the Damages? Will the Kerbal Space Command Finally Hire an Engineer who actually finished School? Tune in next week!
Loved the story I can't tell you home many times I have used space stations as rescue outposts.
This type of stuff belongs under Fan Works / Mission Reports.
